HomePage.introText: Highly skilled Software Engineer specializing in Javascript, Typescript, React, and CSS. Proven track record of delivering high-quality web applications that create efficient and user-friendly solutions. AboutPage.title: Passionate Software Engineer with a Love for Innovation
AboutPage.firstParagraph: I am a highly skilled Software Engineer with a track record of delivering high-quality web applications. My experience includes pivotal contributions to renowned companies such as BASF, Labvantage Inc., EmiveCo, and PepsiCo
AboutPage.list:
Frontend Development: React, Next.js, Typescript, HTML5, CSS (Tailwind, SCSS, Styled-Components, ChakraUI, PandaCSS, Bootstrap), and Express
State Management: Redux, Zustand and Jotai
Backend Technologies: NodeJS, Prisma, Drizzle, PlanetScale, Firebase, MongoDB, MySQL, and SQL Server
DevOps Culture: Azure DevOps Tools, CI/CD with Azure and GitHub Actions
Component Development: Writing high-performing and reusable components with Storybook and PreviewJS
Code Quality: Refactoring, reviewing, debugging code, and writing tests with Cypress and Jest
AboutPage.paragraphs:
My expertise with React and Next.js has allowed me to build dynamic and highly responsive user interfaces. I have developed complex single-page applications (SPAs) and server-side rendered (SSR) applications, ensuring optimal performance and user experience. Utilizing Typescript has enabled me to write robust and type-safe code, reducing bugs and enhancing maintainability. My deep understanding of Express has been crucial in developing scalable backend services and APIs, supporting the seamless integration of frontend and backend functionalities.
I have extensive experience in both creating and delivering projects from scratch and joining ongoing projects to refactor, rebuild, and ensure delivery with quality and performance. My proficiency in utilizing Scrum and agile methodologies ensures that projects are completed on time and to the highest standard. I place a strong emphasis on tracking all code with the best Git practices and tools.
As the founder, teacher, and mentor at Iniciativa Code!, a nonprofit organization, I guide individuals in technology for free. I have successfully assisted dozens of people in Brazil to start their tech careers through free courses, mentorship, and networking with tech companies.
My journey has also involved optimizing development processes and implementing best practices to enhance code quality and performance. By focusing on writing reusable and high-performing components, I ensure that applications are scalable and maintainable. My experience with modern CSS frameworks and libraries, such as Tailwind, SCSS, Styled-Components, ShadCN, ArkUI, PandaCss, ChakraUI, and Bootstrap, has allowed me to create visually appealing and user-friendly interfaces.
I am dedicated to continuously learning and growing in the field of software engineering, always aiming to deliver exceptional results and drive innovation.
